name: Leonard BOLDEN, Appellee, v. SOUTHEASTERN PENNSYLVANIA TRANSPORTATION AUTHORITY, Appellant
name_abbreviation: Bolden v. Southeastern Pennsylvania Transportation Authority

judges: BEFORE: CAPPY, C.J., and CASTILLE, NEWMAN, SAYLOR, EAKIN, BAER and BALDWIN, JJ.
parties: Leonard BOLDEN, Appellee, v. SOUTHEASTERN PENNSYLVANIA TRANSPORTATION AUTHORITY, Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
The Order of the Commonwealth Court is affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Adam Anthony DeSipio, Esq., Saul H. Krenzel, Esq., Krenzel, Saul H. & Associates, for Southeastern Pennsylvania Transportation Authority.
Steven M. Lafferty, Esq., William Louis Myers, Jr., Esq., Philadelphia, for Leonard Bolden.
